Name: John Muriango
Title: Soul Care
Review: An amazing historic Church. Provides spiritual nourishing to our souls as they preach the Gospel of grace.

Name: pilgrim_gsa
Title: 1857 Relic
Review: Here is a Church that was built to commemorate those Britishers who were killed in 1857 uprising .Has wonderful  commemorative plaques all in the church  with stained glass windows  not to be missed by historical buffs.

Name: RAJENDRA884 PRASAD
Title: An eye catcher attraction
Review: Christ Church in Lucknow is a place of worship, sign of British heritage in this region.  It is beautifully illuminated after sunset and is a favourite of all young and old photographers.

Name: durham05
Title: Very old church
Review: One of the oldest churches in Lucknow. Was closed when I arrived but caretaker opened especially for me. Very historic and liked the monuments. Sadly needs some maintenance work.

Name: mohitv
Title: Christ Church
Review: Initially known as the church of England, this was the first church in Lucknow made in the memory of British soldiersA very beautiful architecture becomes more beautiful in the night lights. Situated in Hazratganj near to the governors house.

Name: garhwaliya
Title: Big maintained place
Review: Mostly churches are highly maintained. This is very big place. Lots of people come here for wishes and peace.

Name: ayushagarwal022
Title: calm and peaceful
Review: Though all churches are usually very calm and peaceful but this church deserves a special mention of its calm environment. well maintained and neat and clean surroundings.

Name: Nandana1
Title: Nice place to Pray
Review: This is a Christian Church and called as Christ Church. Everyone is welcomed here to know the Gospel of Christ. Sunday worship is very nice here.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Christ Church
Review: Christ Church is very peaceful and attractive. Here the heart is very relaxed. Must Visit place. Recommend to you all

Name: AmitTraveller2016
Title: Nice Church...
Review: A nice church to visit if you are in Lucknow and like visiting churches. The architect is simple but beautiful, not so big either. the place is calm and peaceful. It is near Wing fileld park.
